title: Type identification assistance for several publications
content:
I would very much appreciate assistance from anyone who might be able to help me identify the typefaces in the attached image.  
There is seven altogether.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/plants_6392.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/plants2_5950.jpg)

 [‹ Monoline display face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230958/http:/typophile.com/node/42817 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sainsbury's typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310230958/http:/typophile.com/node/42855 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hinching Chan
